description: This file contains metadata about the product catalog.

name: Center for Competitive Exams
description: A centralized web and mobile platform managed by college institutions to provide students with reliable information about competitive exams, job openings, and internship opportunities. Faculty members can post verified listings, which are reviewed and approved by the super admin before publication. The platform ensures students do not miss important deadlines and have access to career resources, company insights, and study materials to make informed career decisions.

name: Assessment Platform
description: A comprehensive platform designed to streamline the assessment process for educational institutions. It includes features for creating, managing, and monitoring tests, as well as proctoring tools to ensure test integrity. The platform is designed to be user-friendly for both staff and students, providing detailed analytics and reports to track performance and engagement.

Students often struggle to find credible job opportunities and internships due to scattered information across multiple sources. They may miss deadlines, lack proper guidance, or struggle with application procedures. Faculty members require a structured system to share verified job openings while ensuring institutional credibility.
A digital solution is required to centralize career opportunities and study materials while maintaining an approval workflow to ensure authenticity and quality.

A role-based platform where faculty members can post verified opportunities, super admins oversee approvals, and students access structured listings with job descriptions, salary insights, and application deadlines.
A fully functional career portal that categorizes jobs and internships, integrates study materials for exam preparation, and provides notifications to students about new postings and deadlines.
Regular feedback from students and faculty will be gathered to refine user experience, improve features, and ensure students maximize their career opportunities.

Gain access to a structured and verified database of job opportunities, internships, and study materials. Receive real-time notifications about deadlines, explore company profiles, and track applications efficiently.
Easily post job and internship listings while ensuring that students receive credible and relevant opportunities. Monitor student engagement with postings and study materials.
Improve student placement rates by providing a dedicated career platform that fosters professional growth, skill development, and better employment opportunities.
Super Admins have unrestricted control over the platform, managing all aspects, including user roles, content approvals, and security settings.
benefit: Ensures that the system runs smoothly while maintaining security and integrity.

description: Create, edit, and remove admin accounts to manage platform functionalities efficiently.
benefit: Allows for role-based access control, ensuring a structured workflow within the institution.

description: Gain complete access to all job and internship postings, along with statistical insights into engagement rates, applications, and student success metrics.
benefit: Provides valuable data to improve job offerings and enhance student placement rates.

description: Review, approve, or reject job and internship postings submitted by faculty. Provide feedback on rejected postings to maintain listing quality.
benefit: Ensures that students only access authentic and high-quality job opportunities.

description: Oversee the verification process of student accounts managed by admins to prevent unauthorized access.
benefit: Protects the integrity of the platform and ensures only genuine students benefit from job listings.

description: Monitor, review, and approve all uploaded content, including study materials and job postings.
benefit: Prevents misinformation, ensuring that all content is accurate, relevant, and institutionally approved.

description: Track job postings, study material uploads, student approvals, and overall admin activities.
benefit: Provides transparency, accountability, and improved governance of platform operations.

description: Generate analytical reports on student engagement, job application rates, and platform usage trends.
benefit: Helps institutions refine their career services and better support students’ career growth.

description: Secure admin login with a personalized dashboard displaying key platform metrics and functionalities.
benefit: Enables efficient management of job postings, study materials, and student accounts.

description: Classify job and internship postings based on industry, job role, and location for better searchability.
benefit: Improves the user experience by making job searches faster and more relevant.

description: Create, edit, and delete job and internship listings while ensuring that they contain accurate descriptions and application details.
benefit: Keeps job postings up to date, providing students with reliable career opportunities.

description: Upload, organize, and categorize study materials for competitive exams like TNPSC, Banking, and more.
benefit: Helps students prepare effectively for competitive exams with easy access to learning resources.

description: Review and approve study materials before they are published on the platform.
benefit: Ensures that students only access high-quality and institution-approved study materials.

description: Post and update student achievements, including placement milestones and competitive exam successes.
benefit: Motivates students and highlights the institution’s success in career placements.

description: Verify and approve student registrations to ensure only eligible students access the platform.
benefit: Maintains a controlled and secure environment for students.

description: Track clicks, downloads, job applications, and other student activities to measure engagement levels.
benefit: Provides insights into student behavior and helps improve content delivery.

description: Secure and simple registration and login system for students.
benefit: Ensures a seamless onboarding process and account security.

description: A central hub displaying job/internship listings, study materials, and notifications.
benefit: Provides students with quick and easy access to all resources.

description: Jobs are categorized based on industry, role, and location for efficient searching.
benefit: Helps students quickly find relevant job opportunities.

description: Advanced search and filter options for job postings.
benefit: Allows students to refine their searches based on specific preferences.

description: Provides external application links for students to apply directly to jobs and internships.
benefit: Simplifies the application process and reduces manual effort.

description: A dedicated section for competitive exam preparation materials, including PDFs, videos, and guides.
benefit: Provides structured learning resources to help students excel in exams.

description: Real-time alerts for job postings, study material uploads, and application deadlines.
benefit: Ensures students never miss important updates or deadlines.

description: A personal space where students can save and track job listings of interest.
benefit: Helps students keep track of job opportunities they wish to revisit later.

description: Students can update personal details, track applications, and manage their job preferences.
benefit: Allows students to personalize their experience and monitor their job-seeking journey.

description: Efficient test creation and management for staff.
Real-time monitoring of test activity and student performance.
Enhanced test security through multiple proctoring features.
Detailed performance reports for students to track their progress.
User-friendly interface for students to access and take assessments.
Understand the needs, challenges, and expectations of students, faculty, and administrators regarding assessment management.
methods: User Interviews: Conduct sessions with students and staff to gather insights.
Surveys: Collect feedback on current challenges in exam management.
Observations: Study how assessments are conducted in different institutions.
benefits: Ensures user needs are accurately captured.
Identifies pain points in existing assessment methods.

description: Clearly outline the core problems faced by users and set objectives for the platform.
problemStatements: Students struggle to keep track of assessment schedules and deadlines.
Staff face challenges in managing and monitoring assessments efficiently.
Ensuring test integrity through proctoring is a major concern.
benefits: Helps create a solution tailored to actual user problems.

description: Brainstorm potential solutions and innovative features for the application.
methods: Feature Prioritization: Rank features based on user impact.
Collaborative Workshops: Engage stakeholders in idea generation.
benefits: Encourages innovative approaches to assessment management.
Leads to well-structured and user-friendly features.

description: Develop interactive mockups and test early-stage designs.
methods: Low-Fidelity Prototypes: Sketch initial concepts for feedback.
High-Fidelity Prototypes: Build clickable designs for usability testing.
User Testing: Gather feedback on prototype interactions.
benefits: Saves development time by refining features before full implementation.

description: Validate the final product with users and iterate based on feedback.
methods: Beta Testing: Deploy the platform to a limited group of students and staff.
Performance Evaluation: Analyze system performance under different loads.
Iterative Improvements: Continuously refine the platform based on feedback.
benefits: Ensures a well-optimized and user-friendly product.
Improves adoption by addressing user concerns before full deployment.

description: View key statistics related to tests and students.
Displays the number of tests created by the logged-in staff member.
Displays the number of students registered under the staff's oversight.
benefits: Provides an overview of student engagement

description: Displays the number of ongoing tests.
Displays the number of tests that have been completed.
benefits: Analyzing completion rates and performance trends

description: Displays the number of scheduled tests.
Manage and organize tests with search and filter options.
Tests are displayed under categories: All, Live, Completed, and Upcoming.
Search tests by name for quick access.
benefits: Saves time in locating specific tests

description: Tags such as Upcoming and Live are displayed for easy identification.
Manage student accounts and track their progress.
Staff can manage student profiles.
Students are displayed based on year.
Search students by name and filter them by college, department, and year.
View and analyze student performance reports.
Displays the number of total tests taken, completed, and in progress.
Shows assessment details like total questions, correct answers, time taken, and incorrect answers.
Displays anomalies such as full-screen breaches, face recognition mismatches, and audio disturbances.
A repository for storing and managing questions and test collections.
Allows staff to add and save questions for future use.
Filters questions by difficulty level and subject tags.
Stores sets of questions as collections for repeated use.
Feature for staff to create, configure, and manage tests.
Staff can set the test name, start and end time, description, and guidelines.
System ensures the opening time is from the present and closing time is after the opening.
Configure number of questions, duration, total marks, pass percentage, and result visibility.
Includes full-screen mode, face detection, noise detection, and device restriction.
Staff can upload questions manually, in bulk, or from libraries.
Generates questions based on topic, sub-topic, and Bloom's taxonomy levels.
Publish tests using filters or search.
Allows staff to create tests divided into sections such as aptitude, coding, logical reasoning, etc.
benefits: Better assessment of specific skill sets

description: Students can access tests based on their availability and view test details.
Students can see ongoing and live assessments.
Students can view completed or closed test details.
Tests that haven’t started yet are tagged as ‘Yet to Start’.
benefits: Ensures students know about upcoming assessments

description: Each test shows essential details such as title, registration period, duration, and assessment type.
Displays the number of questions, sections, and total marks per test.
benefits: Gives clarity on the test structure

description: Displays test guidelines, enabled proctoring modes, and pass percentage.
benefits: Ensures students are aware of rules

description: User-friendly interface for students to take assessments efficiently.
Indicates the status of each question using different colors.
Yellow for current question, green for answered, blue for review, and no color for unanswered.
benefits: Clear visual cues for easy navigation

description: Allows students to mark questions for later review.
benefits: Ensures no question is left out

description: Students can view their test results based on staff permissions.
Students can see their results if staff allow immediate release.
Results remain inaccessible if staff restrict student access.
benefits: Allows staff to control when results are published

description: Displays a breakdown of total questions, correct answers, wrong answers, time taken, and proctoring violations.
Lists full-screen policy breaches, face recognition anomalies, and audio disturbances detected.
Displays the student’s total percentage, along with question details, student answers, and correct answers.
Filters allow students to view all, correctly answered, incorrect, or unanswered questions.
